markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=1320) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Skyborn Tengu](/Heritages.aspx?ID=79) heritage

</column>

---

To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below. You grow a pair of magical wings or expand your existing ones. For 5 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

<title level="2">Soaring Flight leads to...</title>
[Soaring Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2447)
name: Soaring Flight
